author: silviodonato
body:
#### PR description:
This PR is a backport of all new Phase-2 L1T code to 11_1_X.
The L1T 11_2_X code has been taken from CMSSW_11_2_X_2020-07-02-2300.

Backported packages
DTTriggerPhase2
L1CaloTrigger
L1TTrackMatch
TrackerDTC
TrackFindingTMTT
TrackFindingTracklet

The PR should work with https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/6024

cc: @rekovic
title: Backport of new Phase-2 L1T packages to 11_1_X
